body:
Comment 1: 
The same would have to be done for all other editor plugins (Emacs, bbedit, kate, ...)
and then the question is whether one should have a single repository for all editor
plugins, or one per plugin. The latter seems like overkill and annoying to maintain, but
there'd probably be someone who'd complain about the former.

Then there's the problem that moving it now would break existing setups and that people
might not discover the editor plugins at all. Also they couldn't as easily be bundled
with the binary distribution if they live in a separate repository.
